snippet.title: whisper breaks srb2's techno hill zone
snippet.description:
what an interesting character. you have so many tools to do so many things, plus a gun. i tried to showcase what i could, but unfortunately i couldn't show off the rocket, the free aim (the life of a controller player), or the full extent of the hammer cancel with how vertical and claustrophobic thz is. i also left out some optimizations for my own sake, planning to play the character a little more before i start sweating the micro optimizations

tasses with this character are gonna be absolutely bonkers

whisper here: https://mb.srb2.org/addons/whisper-the-wolf.4325/
custom save lets me be in record attack with a modded char, load your chars and then load this up: https://mb.srb2.org/threads/custom-gamedata-allows-you-to-create-save-files-with-addons.27064/
